ComicInfo.Summary:
New Japan’s guardian falls to Earth!
A fallen, broken, and depowered Rai finds himself captured by a mysterious and savage tribe on Earth! With his friends being hunted and tortured back in New Japan, Rai will find help in an unexpected yet familiar face who knows a thing or two about survival. Matt Kindt and Clayton Crain continue their acclaimed run with a surprise appearance as “THE ORPHAN” marches toward a coming conflict for 4001 A.D.!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Interlocking Cover A | Clayton Crain | 1 | B | Interlocking Cover B | Clayton Crain | 2 | C | Cover C | Ryan Sook | 3 | D | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover D | Ryan Lee & Allen Passalaqua | 4 |
